summary: This bill, the Termination of Reckless Unchecked Mandates from this President Act (TRUMP Act), aims to restrict the use of federal funds for issuing Executive orders during periods when discretionary appropriations have lapsed. It seeks to prevent the obligation or expenditure of federal funds to promulgate new executive orders or presidential memoranda during a government shutdown due to a lack of approved funding for non-essential government programs. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on October 3, 2025.
